choose_transport.description: Please select the transport method you want to use to connect to the inverter.

configure_serial.description: The inverter must be connected via an RS485 adaptor. Please select the serial port and the inverter's address as configured on the LCD panel.

configure_tcp.description: Please enter the TCP host and port of the Ethernet / RS485 gateway that connects to the inverter and the inverter's serial address as configured on the LCD panel.

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect, please check connection settings, electrical connection and that inverter is on (in daylight)
error.invalid_serial_port: Serial port is not a valid device or could not be opened
error.cannot_open_serial_port: Cannot open serial port, please check and try again

abort.no_serial_ports: No com ports found. The integration needs a valid RS485 device to communicate.
abort.reconfigure_successful: The integration has been successfully reconfigured.
